augments.name: Magic Wand
augments.desc: Gain a Needlessly Large Rod. Your units gain 18 Ability Power.

augments.name: On a Roll
augments.desc: Whenever you star up a champion, gain up to 3 free Shop rerolls per round. Gain 3 gold.

augments.name: Endless Hordes
augments.desc: Gain +3 maximum team size, but your units can only hold 1 item and their total health is reduced by 15%. Gain 4 gold.

augments.name: Endless Hordes+
augments.desc: Gain +3 maximum team size, but your units can only hold 1 item and their total health is reduced by 15%. Gain 4 gold.

augments.name: One, Two, Five!
augments.desc: Gain 1 random component, 2 gold, and 1 random 5-cost champion.

augments.name: Ones Twos Three
augments.desc: Gain 2 1-cost champion, 2 2-cost champions, and 1 3-cost champion.

augments.name: Over Encumbered
augments.desc: For the next stage, you only get 1 bench slot. After, get 3 item components.

augments.name: Overwhelming Force
augments.desc:
Gain a Deathblade, an Infinity Edge, a BF Sword, and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Attack Carries or Attack Fighters!

augments.name: Pandora's Bench
augments.desc: Gain 2 gold. At the start of every round, champions on the 3 rightmost bench slots transform into random champions of the same cost.

augments.name: Pandora's Items
augments.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized (except Tactician's Crown and Spatula).

Gain 1 random component.

augments.name: Pandora's Items II
augments.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown and Spatula).

Gain 2 random components.

augments.name: Pandora's Items III
augments.desc:
Round start: items on your bench are randomized (excluding Tactician's Crown and Spatula).

Gain 1 random Radiant item.

augments.name: Phreaky Friday
augments.desc:
Gain an Infinity Force. After 5 player combats, gain another.

Infinity Force: Artifact that offers tons of offensive and defensive stats

augments.name: Phreaky Friday
augments.desc: Gain an Infinity Force. After 3 player combats, gain another.

augments.name: Phreaky Friday+
augments.desc:
Gain an Infinity Force. After 3 player combats, gain another.

Infinity Force: Artifact that offers tons of offensive and defensive stats

augments.name: Phreaky Friday+
augments.desc: Gain an Infinity Force. After 2 player combats, gain another.

augments.name: Pick of the Litter
augments.desc: Open a special Shop with 3 free 3-cost champions. You can only pick 1, but you get 2 copies of it.

augments.name: Pick of the Litter+
augments.desc: Open a special Shop with 3 free 4-cost champions. You can only pick 1, but you get 2 copies of it.

augments.name: Portable Forge
augments.desc:
Choose 1 of 4 Artifacts.

Artifacts are more powerful items with a unique effect.

augments.name: Portable Forge+
augments.desc: Choose 1 of 3 Artifacts.

augments.name: Portable Forge++
augments.desc: Choose 1 of 4 Artifacts.

augments.name: Preparation I
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 25 Health, 3% Attack Damage and 3 Ability Power every round. Champions start with I stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

augments.name: Preparation I
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 35, 4 Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 3 times.

augments.name: Preparation II
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 35 Health, 4% Attack Damage and 4 Ability Power every round. Champions start with I stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

augments.name: Preparation II
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 50, 6 Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 3 times.

augments.name: Preparation III
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 50 Health, 7% Attack Damage and 7 Ability Power every round. Champions start with I stack of this effect, and can stack up to 4 times.

augments.name: Preparation III
augments.desc: Champions on your bench permanently gain 70, 9% Attack Damage and Ability Power every round, up to 3 times.

augments.name: Prizefighter
augments.desc: Gain 2 item component(s). Every 5 wins gives you an item component.

augments.name: Pumping Up I
augments.desc: Your team gains 8% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 0.5% more.

augments.name: Pumping Up II
augments.desc: Your team gains 10% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 1% more.

augments.name: Pumping Up III
augments.desc: Your team gains 12% Attack Speed now. Each round after, they gain 2% more.

augments.name: Radiant Refactor
augments.desc:
Gain a Masterwork Upgrade and 1 component anvils.

Masterwork Upgrade upgrades an item to Radiant!

augments.name: Radiant Relics
augments.desc:
Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items. Gain a Magnetic Remover.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

augments.name: Raining Gold
augments.desc: Gain 8 gold now and 1 gold every round.

augments.name: Raining Gold+
augments.desc: Gain 18 gold now and 1 gold every round.

augments.name: Reach The Summit
augments.desc: When you reach Level 9, gain 10 gold and 50.

augments.name: Recombobulator
augments.desc: Champions on your board permanently transform into random champions 1 cost tier higher. Gain 2 Magnetic Removers.

augments.name: Blistering Strikes
augments.desc: Your team's attacks burn their targets for 5% of their max Health over 5 seconds. Attacks also reduce their targets' healing received by 33%.

augments.name: ReinFOURcement
augments.desc: The next 4-cost champion you buy is instantly upgraded to 2-star. Get 12 gold.

augments.name: Return on Investment
augments.desc: When you reroll your Shop 16 times, gain a Tactician's Crown.

augments.name: Rich Get Richer
augments.desc: Gain 12 gold. Your max interest is increased to 7.

augments.name: Rich Get Richer+
augments.desc: Gain 18 gold. Your max interest is increased to 7.

augments.name: Risky Moves
augments.desc: Your Tactician loses 20 Health, but after 7 player combats, gain 30 gold.

augments.name: Roll The Dice
augments.desc:
Gain a Rascal's Gloves item. This equips 2 random Radiant items every round.

Radiant items are very powerful versions of completed items.

augments.name: Cruel Pact
augments.desc: Buying XP costs 6 Health instead of 4 gold. Heal 3 player health before each player combat.

augments.name: Salvage Bin
augments.desc: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 7 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

augments.name: Salvage Bin+
augments.desc: Gain 1 random completed item now, and 1 component after 4 player combats. Selling champions breaks completed items into components (excluding Tactician's Crown).

augments.name: Scapegoat
augments.desc: Gain a Training Dummy and 4 gold. If it is the first to die each player combat, gain 1 gold.

augments.name: Scoped Weapons
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain +2 Attack Range and 15% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Scoped Weapons II
augments.desc: Your units that start combat in the back 2 rows gain infinite Attack Range.

augments.name: Scoreboard Scrapper
augments.desc: Every round, if you're in the bottom 4, your team permanently gains 1.5% Attack Damage and Ability Power. If you're in the top 4, they have 10% more Health.

augments.name: Second Wind I
augments.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 40% of their missing Health.

augments.name: Second Wind II
augments.desc: After 10 seconds of combat, your units heal 60% of their missing Health.

augments.name: Sharing Is Caring
augments.desc: Combat start: You gain 1 gold and your opponent gains 1 gold.

augments.name: Shock Treatment
augments.desc: Gain a Statikk Shiv. Your Statikk Shivs' chain lightning effects deal 40-125% more damage (based on stage level).

augments.name: Shoplifting
augments.desc: After your first shop refresh each turn, gain the highest cost champion for free.

augments.name: Silver Spoon
augments.desc: Gain 10 XP.

augments.name: Golden Ticket
augments.desc: Each time your Shop is rerolled, you have a 30% chance to gain a free reroll.

augments.name: Silver Veil
augments.desc: Your team gains 5% Attack Speed and is immune to the first crowd control effect in combat.

augments.name: Slammin'
augments.desc: Gain 1 random Component(s). After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than Consumables), gain 2 XP.

augments.name: Slammin'+
augments.desc: Gain 1 random component(s) and 10 XP now. After each player combat, if there are no items on your bench (other than Consumables), gain 2 XP.

augments.name: Sleight of Hand
augments.desc: Gain a Thief's Gloves. Champions holding this item gain 100 Health and 20% Attack Speed.

augments.name: March of Progress
augments.desc: Gain 3 XP now, and bonus XP equal to your level at the start of every player combat round. You can no longer use gold to level up.

augments.name: Social Distancing I
augments.desc: Units that begin combat with no adjacent allies gain 10% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

augments.name: Social Distancing II
augments.desc: Units that begin combat with no adjacent allies gain 16% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

augments.name: Social Distancing III
augments.desc: Combat start: Units with no adjacent allies gain 25% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

augments.name: Stars are Born
augments.desc: The first 1-cost and 2-cost champions you buy are instantly upgraded to 2-star. Gain 7 gold.

augments.name: Starter Kit
augments.desc:
Gain a 4-cost champion, a 2-star 1-cost champion that shares a trait with them, and 4 gold.

At the start of the next 2 stages, gain that 4-cost champion again.

augments.name: Stationary Support I
augments.desc: After 8 player combats, gain 1 Training Dummy(s) with 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

augments.name: Stationary Support II
augments.desc: Gain 1 Training Dummy with 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

augments.name: Stationary Support III
augments.desc: Gain 1 Training Dummy with 2 permanently attached Support item(s).

augments.name: Sticks And Stones
augments.desc: Champions that aren't holding items Shred and Sunder enemies for 3 seconds. Physical damage Sunders for 30%, and magic damage Shreds for 30%.

augments.name: Stimpack
augments.desc: Gain 4 components after you lose 50 player health.

augments.name: Sunfire Board
augments.desc: At the start of combat, burn all enemies for 10% of their maximum Health over 20 seconds and reduce healing received by 33%.

augments.name: Support Cache
augments.desc: Choose 1 of 4 Support items.

augments.name: Switching Gears
augments.desc: Gain 3 gold whenever you break your win or loss streak.

augments.name: Tactician's Tools
augments.desc: Gain two Spatulas and 1 Component Anvil.

augments.name: Phony Frontline
augments.desc: Gain 2 Target Dummies.

augments.name: Teaming Up I
augments.desc: Gain 1 random component and 2 random Tier 3 champions.

augments.name: Teaming Up II
augments.desc: Gain 1 random Support item and 2 random 4-cost champions.

augments.name: The Golden Egg
augments.desc: Gain a golden egg that hatches in 11 turns for a huge amount of loot. Winning player combat speeds up the hatch timer by an extra turn.

augments.name: The Golden Egg
augments.desc: Gain a golden egg that hatches in 6 turns for a huge amount of loot. Winning player combat speeds up the hatch timer by an extra turn.

augments.name: The Golden Remover
augments.desc:
Gain a Golden Remover and component item anvil.

Golden Remover is an Item Remover with infinite uses.

augments.name: Think Fast
augments.desc: Shop refreshes are free until the end of this round. Traits and other augments do not benefit from these free shops. Gain 3 gold.

augments.name: Three's a Crowd
augments.desc: Your team gains 75 Health for each unique 3-cost champion on your board.

augments.name: Three's Company
augments.desc: Gain 5 random 3-cost champions.

augments.name: Wise Spending
augments.desc: Gain 2 experience points when you refresh your Shop.

augments.name: Thrill of the Hunt I
augments.desc: Your units heal 350 Health on kill.

augments.name: Thrill of the Hunt II
augments.desc: Your units heal 550 Health on kill.

augments.name: Tiniest Titan
augments.desc: Gain 2 player health and 2 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

augments.name: Tiniest Titan+
augments.desc:
Gain 2 player health and 2 gold after every player combat. Your Tactician also moves faster.

Gain 15 gold now.

augments.name: Tiny, but Deadly
augments.desc: Your team is 50% smaller, but moves and attacks 30% faster.

augments.name: Tiny Grab Bag
augments.desc: Gain a random component, 2 gold, a Magnetic Remover.

augments.name: Tiny Titans
augments.desc: Increase your current and max player health by 30.

augments.name: Ancient Archives I
augments.desc: Gain 1 Tome of Traits and 3 gold.

augments.name: Ancient Archives II
augments.desc: Gain 2 Tome of Traits and 5 gold.

augments.name: Tons of Stats!
augments.desc: Your team gains 44 Health, 4% Attack Damage, 4 Ability Power, 4 Armor, 4 Magic Resist, 4% Attack Speed, and 4 Mana.

augments.name: Too Much Candy
augments.desc: Your rerolls cost 0 gold. Every 6 rerolls, the cost goes up by 1 gold. At the start of each stage your reroll cost is reset to 0.

augments.name: Training Reward
augments.desc: Gain 5 gold and a Lesser Champion Duplicator.

augments.name: Training Reward II
augments.desc: Gain 12 gold and a Lesser Champion Duplicator.

augments.name: Training Reward III
augments.desc: Gain 24 gold and a Champion Duplicator.

augments.name: Trade Sector
augments.desc: Gain a free Shop reroll every round. Gain 1 gold.

augments.name: Trade Sector+
augments.desc: Gain a free Shop refresh each round. Gain 10 golds.

augments.name: Built Different I
augments.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 200-300 Health and 25-55% Attack Speed. (based on current Stage)

augments.name: Built Different II
augments.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 240-530 Health and 45-60% Attack Speed (based on current Stage).

augments.name: Built Different III
augments.desc: Your units with no Traits active gain 300-600 Health and 50-70% Attack Speed (based on current Stage).

augments.name: Transfusion I
augments.desc: Your team gains 20 Health, plus 2 Health per missing Tactician Health.

augments.name: Transfusion II
augments.desc: Your team gains 40 Health, plus 3 Health per missing Tactician Health.

augments.name: Transfusion III
augments.desc: Your team gains 50 Health, plus 5 Health per missing Tactician Health.

augments.name: Trash to Treasure
augments.desc: Reforging completed items turns them into a random Artifact and does not consume the reforger. Gain a Reforger and 2 Component Anvil(s).

augments.name: Tri Force I
augments.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 150 Health, 10 starting Mana, and 10% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Tri Force II
augments.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 125 Health, 15 starting Mana, and 15% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Tri Force III
augments.desc: Your Tier 3 champions gain 200 Health, 25 starting Mana, and 25% Attack Speed.

augments.name: True Twos
augments.desc: Gain 1 random 2-star Tier 1 champions and 1 random 2-star Tier 2 champion.

augments.name: Double Trouble I
augments.desc: If you have exactly 2 copies of a champion on your board, they both gain 25 Attack Damage, Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Double Trouble II
augments.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 30% Attack Damage and 30 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Double Trouble III
augments.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 40% Attack Damage and 40 Ability Power, Armor, and Magic Resist. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Twin Terror I
augments.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 350 Health and 35% Attack Speed. Anytime you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Twin Terror II
augments.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 500 Health, 50% Attack Speed. Anytime you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Two for One
augments.desc: Each round, get a copy of the first champion you buy that costs 3 or less.

augments.name: Two Healthy
augments.desc: Your team gains 80 Health for each unique 2-cost champion on your board.

augments.name: Legend Augment - Silver
augments.desc: To comply Riot Games' policy, selected Legend Augments will not be displayed. In stage 2-1, a silver-level legend augment was selected.

augments.name: Legend Augment - Gold
augments.desc: To comply Riot Games' policy, selected Legend Augments will not be displayed. In stage 2-1, a gold-level legend augment was selected.

augments.name: Legend Augment - Prismatic
augments.desc: To comply Riot Games' policy, selected Legend Augments will not be displayed. In stage 2-1, a prismatic-level legend augment was selected.

augments.name: Unleashed Arcana
augments.desc:
Gain a Jeweled Gauntlet, a Rabadon's Deathcap, a Needlessly Large Rod, and a Magnetic Remover.

Useful for Magic Carries or Magic Casters!

augments.name: Urf's Grab Bag I
augments.desc: Gain 1 Spatula and 1 random item component.

augments.name: Urf's Grab Bag II
augments.desc: Gain 1 Spatula and 3 random item components.

augments.name: Vampirism I
augments.desc:
Your team gains 20 Health. Gain another 2 Health and 1% Omnivamp per 5 missing player health.
(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

augments.name: Vampirism II
augments.desc:
Your team gains 50 Health. Gain another 6 Health and 1% Omnivamp per 5 missing player health.
(Omnivamp: healing for a percent of damage dealt)

augments.name: Verdant Veil
augments.desc: Your units are immune to crowd control effects for the first 20 seconds of combat. Gains 15% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Wandering Trainer II
augments.desc: Gain 6 gold and a Training Dummy with 3 permanently attached Emblems.

augments.name: Wandering Trainer I
augments.desc: Gain 1 gold and a Training Dummy with 2 permanently attached Emblems.

augments.name: What Doesn't Kill You
augments.desc: Gain 2 gold after losing a player combat. Gain a random component after every 4 losses.

augments.name: What the Forge
augments.desc: Completed items you own (except Tactician's Crown and Emblems) are transformed into random Artifacts. Champions gain 60 Health per equipped Artifact. Gain 1 Artifact Anvil.

augments.name: Windfall
augments.desc: Gain 20 gold.

augments.name: Windfall+
augments.desc: Gain 35 gold.

augments.name: Windfall++
augments.desc: Gain 40 gold.

augments.name: Woodland Charm
augments.desc: Your highest Health champion is cloned. Clones cannot hold items.

augments.name: You Have My Bow
augments.desc: Gain a Recurve Bow. Your units gain 12% Attack Speed.

augments.name: You Have My Sword
augments.desc: Gain a B.F. Sword. Your units gain 15% Attack Damage.

augments.name: Young and Wild and Free
augments.desc: You can always move freely on Carousel rounds. Gain 2 gold.

augments.name: Call to Chaos
augments.desc:
Gain a powerful and random reward.
(Randomly gain one of the following:)
[58 gold], [64 experience], [40 rerolls that do not expire], [Training dummy with 2x Zeke's Herald], [Training dummy with 2x Locket of the Iron Solari], [3x Hullcrushers and an item remover], [3x Snipers focus and an item remover], [Random 3-star 3-cost unit and 20 gold], [3x Thief's Gloves and an item remover], [5 random emblems(no duplicates) and an item remover]

augments.name: Arcana Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Arcana Emblem, an Ahri, and a Hecarim.

augments.name: Arcana Crown
augments.desc: Gain an Arcana Emblem, an Adaptive Helm, an Ahri, and a Hecarim.

augments.name: Bastion Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Bastion Emblem and a Nunu.

augments.name: Bastion Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Bastion Emblem, a Steadfast Heart, and a Shen.

augments.name: Blaster Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Blaster Emblem.

augments.name: Blaster Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Blaster Emblem, a Tear of the Goddess, and an Ezreal.

augments.name: Chrono Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Chrono Emblem.

augments.name: Chrono Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Chrono Emblem, a Needlessly Large Rod, and a Zilean.

augments.name: Eldritch Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Eldritch emblem and a Nilah.

augments.name: Eldritch Crown
augments.desc: Gain an Eldritch Emblem, a Bloodthirster, and a Nilah.

augments.name: Faerie Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Faerie Emblem.

augments.name: Faerie Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Faerie Emblem, a Giant Slayer, and a Tristana.

augments.name: Frost Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Frost Emblem.

augments.name: Frost Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Frost Emblem, a Chain Vest, and a Zilean.

augments.name: Honeymancy Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Honeymancy Emblem.

augments.name: Honeymancy Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Honeymancy Emblem, a Chain Vest, and a Nunu.

augments.name: Hunter Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Hunter Emblem and a Kog'Maw.

augments.name: Hunter Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Hunter Emblem, a Runaan's Hurricane, and a Kog'Maw.

augments.name: Incantor Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Incantor Emblem and a Syndra.

augments.name: Incantor Crown
augments.desc: Gain an Incantor Emblem, a Jeweled Gauntlet, and a Syndra.

augments.name: Mage Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Mage Emblem and a Galio.

augments.name: Mage Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Mage Emblem, an Ionic Spark, and a Galio.

augments.name: Multistriker Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Multistriker Emblem.

augments.name: Multistriker Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Multistriker Emblem, a Sparring Gloves, and a Kassadin.

augments.name: Portal Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Portal Emblem.

augments.name: Portal Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Portal Emblem, a Tear of the Goddess, and a Kassadin.

augments.name: Preserver Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Preserver Emblem and a Zilean.

augments.name: Preserver Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Preserver Emblem, a Nashor's Tooth, and a Bard.

augments.name: Pyro Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Pyro Emblem.

augments.name: Pyro Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Pyro emblem, a B.F. Sword, and an Akali.

augments.name: Scholar Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Scholar Emblem and an Ahri.

augments.name: Scholar Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Scholar Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and a Bard.

augments.name: Shapeshifter Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Shapeshifter Emblem and a Shyvana.

augments.name: Shapeshifter Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Shapeshifter Emblem, a Redemption, and a Shyvana.

augments.name: Sugarcraft Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Sugarcraft emblem and a Rumble.

augments.name: Sugarcraft Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Sugarcraft emblem, a Redemption, and a Rumble.

augments.name: Vanguard Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Vanguard Emblem and a Rumble.

augments.name: Vanguard Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Vanguard Emblem, a Protector's Vow, and a Rumble.

augments.name: Warrior Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Warrior Emblem and an Akali.

augments.name: Warrior Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Warrior Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and an Akali.

augments.name: Witchcraft Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Witchcraft emblem.

augments.name: Witchcraft Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Witchcraft emblem, a Hextech Gunblade, and a Cassiopeia.

augments.name: All That Shimmers
augments.desc:
Open an Armory and choose a gold-generating Artifact. Gain a Magnetic Remover. Your max interest is increased to 7.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

augments.name: All That Shimmers+
augments.desc:
Open an Armory and choose a gold-generating Artifact item. Gain a Magnetic Remover and 4 gold. Your max interest is increased to 7.

Interest is extra gold you gain per 10g saved.

augments.name: Anger Issues
augments.desc: All your current and future completed items transform into Guinsoo's Rageblades that grant 35 Armor and Magic Resist. Every 2 Rageblade stacks grant 1% Attack Damage and Ability Power.

augments.name: Assassin's Toolbox
augments.desc: Gain a Prowlers Claw and an Infinity Edge.

augments.name: Avenge the Fallen
augments.desc: After 3 allies die, your team gains 28% Attack Damage, 28 Ability Power, 28 Armor, and 28 Magic Resist.

augments.name: Beggars can be Choosers
augments.desc: You get +3 Augment rerolls for all other augment choices. Gain 7 gold.

augments.name: Blossoming Lotus I
augments.desc: Your team's Abilities can critically strike. Every 3 seconds, your team gains 5% Critical Strike Chance.

augments.name: Blossoming Lotus II
augments.desc: Your team's Abilities can critically strike. Every 3 seconds, your team gains 15% Critical Strike Chance.

augments.name: Called Shot
augments.desc: Set your win streak to +4. Gain 4 gold.

augments.name: Category 5
augments.desc: Gain a Runaan's Hurricane. Your Runaan's Hurricanes shoot 1 extra bolts, each dealing 85% of the original damage.

augments.name: Clockwork Accelerator
augments.desc: Your team gains 10% Attack Speed every 3 seconds in combat.

augments.name: Combat Bandages I
augments.desc: The first time each ally unit falls below 60% health, they restore 100-220 health (based on stage) over 2.5 seconds.

augments.name: Combat Bandages II
augments.desc: The first time each ally unit falls below 60% health, they restore 170-350 health (based on stage) over 2.5 seconds.

augments.name: Dark Alley Dealings
augments.desc: Gain a Suspicious Trenchcoat. After 3 player combats, gain a Trickster's Glass.

augments.name: Dual Purpose
augments.desc: The first time you buy XP each round, gain 2 gold. Whenever you buy XP, reroll your Shop.

augments.name: Duo Queue
augments.desc: Gain 2 random 5-cost champions and 2 copies of a random component.

augments.name: Explosive Growth
augments.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 8 XP.

augments.name: Explosive Growth+
augments.desc: At the start of the next 4 rounds, gain 11 XP.

augments.name: Final Resistance
augments.desc:
Each time an allied champion dies, 30% Shred and Sunder the nearest 4 enemies for 6 seconds.

Shred: reduces Magic Resist, Sunder: reduces Armor

augments.name: Flexible
augments.desc: Gain 1 random emblem. At the start of every Stage, gain a random emblem. Your team gains 30 Health for each emblem they are holding.

augments.name: Giant and Mighty
augments.desc: Your team gets larger, gaining 300 Health and +4% max Health.

augments.name: Hard Commit
augments.desc: Gain a random emblem. Now and at the start of each stage, gain a 1-star champion of that trait with a cost equal to the Stage (max 5).

augments.name: Head Start
augments.desc: Gain 3 random 2-star 1 cost champions. Disable your Shop for the next 3 rounds.

augments.name: High Voltage
augments.desc: Gain an Ionic Spark. Your Ionic Sparks have +3 hex radius and do 25% more damage.

augments.name: I'm the Carry now
augments.desc: Get a Sentinel with tailored offensive items. It gets stronger at the start of each Stage.

augments.name: Immovable Object
augments.desc: Gain a Randuin's Omen. Its range is increased by 1 hex and its effect is increased by 60%.

augments.name: Invested
augments.desc: Gain 16 gold. At the start of each round, gain 1 permanent reroll for every 10 gold above 50 (max 100 gold).

augments.name: Invested+
augments.desc: Gain 26 gold. At the start of each round, gain 1 Shop reroll for every 10 gold above 50 (max 80 gold).

augments.name: Invested++
augments.desc: Gain 45 gold. At the start of each round, gain 1 Shop reroll for every 10 gold above 50 (max 80 gold).

augments.name: Item Collector I
augments.desc: Your team gains 10 Health. For each unique item they are holding, your team gains bonus 2 Health, 1 Attack Damage, and 1 Ability Power.

augments.name: Item Collector II
augments.desc: Your team gains 20 Health. For each unique item they are holding, your team gains bonus 5 Health, 1.5 Attack Damage, and 1.5 Ability Power.

augments.name: Item Ladder
augments.desc: Gain a temporary item that unequips and transforms at the start of each round. The item quality increases each Stage.

augments.name: Mentorship I
augments.desc: If an ally starts combat next to a higher-cost ally, it gains 12% Attack Speed and 150 Health.

augments.name: Mentorship II
augments.desc: If an ally starts combat next to a higher-cost ally, it gains 18% Attack Speed and 220 Health.

augments.name: On The House
augments.desc: Whenever you star up a champion, gain 1 gold. Gain 4 gold now.

augments.name: Patience Is a Virtue
augments.desc: If you did not buy a champion last round, gain 2 free rerolls.

augments.name: Pilfer
augments.desc: Each round, gain a 1-star copy of the first champion you killed last combat.

augments.name: Placebo
augments.desc: Gain 8 gold. Your team gains 1% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Placebo+
augments.desc: Gain 15 gold. Your team gains 1% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Precise Planning
augments.desc: When you win or lose combat by 4 or fewer units, gain 2 gold next round.

augments.name: Replication
augments.desc: Choose 1 of 3 components. For the next 2 rounds, gain a copy of that component.

augments.name: Restart Mission
augments.desc: Sell all champions on your board and bench. Gain 2 random 2-star 3-costs, 3 2-star 2-costs, and a 2-star 1-cost champion.

augments.name: Row Rejuvenation I
augments.desc: Your team has 8% Omnivamp, increased by 1% for every champion that starts combat in that same row.

augments.name: Row Rejuvenation II
augments.desc: Your team has 9% Omnivamp, increased by 1.5% for every champion that starts combat in that same row.

augments.name: Shimmerscale Essence
augments.desc:
Gain a Mogul's Mail. In 5 rounds, gain a Gamblers Blade.

These items give gold as well as combat power.

augments.name: Spellblades
augments.desc: Whenever one of your champion casts, their next attack deals bonus magic damage equal to 120% of their Ability Power.

augments.name: Spellcaster's Toolbox
augments.desc: Gain a Manazane. In 3 rounds, gain a Zhonya's Paradox.

augments.name: Subscription Service
augments.desc: Now, and at the start of each Stage, open a Shop of 4 unique 4-cost champions and gain 6 gold.

augments.name: Support Golem I
augments.desc: Gain 1 Golem that fights for your team, holding 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

augments.name: Support Golem II
augments.desc: Gain 1 Golem that fights for your team, holding 1 permanently attached Support item(s).

augments.name: Thorn-Plated Armor
augments.desc: Gain a Bramble Vest. Your Bramble Vests deal 5-100% more damage (based on Stage) and heal the holder for 50% of the damage dealt.

augments.name: Transfiguration
augments.desc: Gain a random component. For every 3 Charms you purchase this game, gain another component (max +4).

augments.name: Two Tanky
augments.desc: When you field exactly 2 copies of a champion, they both gain 550 Health. When one copy dies, the other gains a 40% max health Shield for 6 seconds. When you 3-star, gain a 2-star copy.

augments.name: Unleash the Beast
augments.desc: Gain a Sterak's Gage. When its effect triggers, the holder gains 35% Attack Speed for the rest of combat and immunity to crowd control for 10 seconds.

augments.name: Upward Mobility
augments.desc: Buying XP costs 1 less. Gain 2 Health and 2 free rerolls whenever you level up.

augments.name: Vertically Inclined
augments.desc:
Your team deals 9% more damage.

Deal 18% more damage instead if you have less active non-unique traits than your opponent.

augments.name: Worth the Wait
augments.desc: Gain 3 random 1-cost champion. After 1 rounds, gain another copy of them at the start of each round for the rest of the game.

augments.name: Worth the Wait II
augments.desc: Gain a random 2-cost champion. Gain another copy at the start of each round for the next rest of the game.

augments.name: Deja Vu
augments.desc: Gain a Galio. Your strongest Galio has +3 range and gains 15 Mana and 8 Ability Power on each attack. His Ability deals 125% more damage, but no longer stuns or reduces damage.

augments.name: Deja Vu+
augments.desc: Gain 2 Galios. Your strongest Galio gain +3 Range and gains 15 Mana and 8 Ability Power on each attack. His spell deals 125% increased damage but no longer stuns or reduces damage.

augments.name: High Horsepower
augments.desc: Gain a 2-star Lillia. Your strongest Lillia gains 125% Attack Speed and moves 75% faster. Her Ability deals 260% bonus damage, but only hits 1 target.

augments.name: Molten Caramel
augments.desc: Gain a Rumble. Your strongest Rumble's Ability deals 190% damage and costs 30 less Mana but no longer reduces damage. Rumble also gains 20% Omnivamp.

augments.name: Molten Caramel+
augments.desc: Gain 2 Rumbles. Your strongest Rumble's Ability deals 190% damage and costs 30 less Mana but no longer reduces damage. Rumble also gains 20% Omnivamp.

augments.name: Spider Queen
augments.desc: Gain a 2-star Elise. Your strongest Elise's Ability no longer Stuns, but poisons her target and the 2 closest enemies with 120% damage over 4 seconds.

augments.name: Spin To Win
augments.desc: Gain 2 Wukongs. Your strongest Wukong's Ability scales with Attack Damage instead of resists. After each cast, Wukong gains stacking 12% Attack Damage and 20% Attack Speed.

augments.name: Sweet Tooth
augments.desc: Gain a Nunu. Your strongest Nunu gains 100 Health, 200% Damage Amp per 150 Health, and his heal scales with Health. Whenever his Ability kills an enemy, Nunu permanently gains 35 Health.

augments.name: Sweet Tooth+
augments.desc: Gain 2 Nunus. Your strongest Nunu gains 100 Health and deals 200% bonus damage per 150 Health. Whenever his Ability kills an enemy, Nunu permanently gains 35 Health.

augments.name: Witchy Wallops
augments.desc: Gain a 2-star Poppy. Your strongest Poppy's Ability no longer Shields, but strikes 3 times, dealing 80% of the original damage.

augments.name: Zap Attack
augments.desc: Gain a 2-star Blitzcrank. Your strongest Blitzcrank becomes supercharged, dealing magic damage to 2 nearby enemies every 5 seconds and on every Ability cast.

augments.name: A Golden Quest
augments.desc: The first time you have 165 or more gold, gain a 2-star 5-cost champion and 3 items tailored to them.

augments.name: An Upgraded Adventure
augments.desc: After upgrading 4 champions to 3-star, gain a magnificent reward. Gain 2 1-cost champions.

augments.name: Fortune Favors the Bold
augments.desc: Winning combat against a player will give bonus orbs. The longer your loss streak, the bigger the payout.

augments.name: Trait Tracker
augments.desc: The first time you activate 7 non-unique traits for 1 combat, gain 6 random emblems.

augments.name: Aggressive Preservation
augments.desc: Your Preservers gain both Mana and Health restoration from the trait. Preservers deal 15% more damage. Gain a Bard and a Zilean.

augments.name: Arcane Conduit
augments.desc: Arcana champions deal 10% bonus damage. If they start combat holding 2 items, they gain a recommended 3rd completed item. Gain an Ahri and a Hecarim.

augments.name: Bee-st Friends
augments.desc: Honeymancers gain 1 more Bee. When Bees jump to a new Honeymancer, the Honeymancer gains a 10% max Health Shield. Gain a Blitzcrank and a Kog'Maw.

augments.name: Caramelized Comforts
augments.desc:
Sugarcrafters gain 60 Health and 10% chance to drop 1 gold on kill for each component they hold. Gain a Soraka and a Rumble.

Artifact, Support, and Radiant items count as 2 components.

augments.name: Cauterize
augments.desc: Pyromancers' attacks deal 5 bonus magic damage for every 3 cinder collected. Gain an Akali and a Shen.

augments.name: Defensive Arts
augments.desc: Enemies hit by Incantor Abilities deal 10% less damage for 2 seconds. At max stacks, Incantors gain 10 Mana every 2 seconds. Gain a Ziggs and a Syndra.

augments.name: Draconic Mastery
augments.desc: Dragons gain 10% Health and 18% Attack Speed. After Dragons score 60 champion takedowns, gain a Smolder. Gain a Nomsy and a Shyvana.

augments.name: Hunting Frenzy
augments.desc: Your Hunters execute enemies below 10% health and gain 5% Attack Speed. Gain a Twitch and a Kog'maw.

augments.name: Eternal Growth
augments.desc: Shapeshifters that begin combat next to another Shapeshifter gain 30 permanent Health. Gain an Elise and a Jayce.

augments.name: Fast Forward
augments.desc: After casting an Ability, Chronomancers gain 40% Attack Speed and 15% Omnivamp for 3 seconds. Gain a Jax and a Zilean.

augments.name: Winter is Coming
augments.desc: The Frost trait also grants 1 placeable Frost Wolf equipped with a Protector's Vow. The wolf gains 15% Attack Speed and 100 Health per Frost tier. Gain a Warwick and a Zilean.

augments.name: Higher Education
augments.desc: Every time your Scholars spend 80 Mana, all Scholars gain 12% Attack Speed. Gain a Zoe and an Ahri.

augments.name: Portal Delivery Service
augments.desc: Gain a Galio and a Zoe. At the start of each round, gain a random 1-3 cost Portal champion.

augments.name: Potions 201
augments.desc: Witch curses last forever. Witch Abilities also curse the nearest uncursed champion. If all champions are cursed, Witches gain 20% Attack Damage and Ability Power. Gain a Poppy and a Cassiopeia.

augments.name: Practice Partners
augments.desc: Whenever a Mage casts an Ability, they grant 5 Mana to the nearest ally. Gain a Soraka and a Galio.

augments.name: Press the Attack
augments.desc: Your Multistriker's attacks apply a stack on their target for 5 seconds. Every 3rd stack deals true damage equal to 4% of the target's max Health. Gain a Kassadin and an Ashe.

augments.name: Raid Boss
augments.desc: Combat start: Your strongest Bastion gains 20% Health. When other unit die, they transfer 20% of their Armor and Magic Resist to it. Gain a Poppy and a Nunu.

augments.name: Royal Guard
augments.desc: Every 3 seconds, all Faeries restore 3% max Health, and the Faerie Queen gains 100% Attack Damage and Ability Power for every other suriving Faerie. Gain a Lillia and a Tristana.

augments.name: School Mascot
augments.desc: The Eldritch summon is holding beneficial items. The summon gains bonus 10% Health and 10 Ability Power. Gain an Elise and a Syndra.

augments.name: Shields Up
augments.desc: Your Vangards have 30% stronger shields. Vanguards become immune to crowd control for 6 seconds whenever they gain a shield. Gain a Rumble and a Blitzcrank.

augments.name: Find Your Center
augments.desc: Your champion that starts combat in the center of the board gains 15% damage and 15% max Health.

augments.name: Double Down
augments.desc: After each player combat, gain gold equal to the length of your win or loss streak (max 4 gold).

augments.name: Eternal Growth+
augments.desc: Shapeshifters that begin combat next to another Shapeshifter gain 30 permanent Health. Shapeshifters gain 60 Health now. Gain an Elise and a Jayce.

augments.name: Marksman's Toolbox
augments.desc: Gain a Sniper's Focus. In 3 rounds, gain a Fishbones.

augments.name: Pillar of Flame
augments.desc: Gain 2 Shens. Your strongest Shen's Ability no longer grants damage reduction, but now summons a large molten pillar that damages enemies in a large line.

augments.name: Abomination Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Abomination Emblem and a Brand.

augments.name: Assassin Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Assassin Emblem and a Khazix.

augments.name: Brawler Crest
augments.desc: Gain an Brawler Emblem and a Sett.

augments.name: Cannoneer Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Cannoneer Emblem and a Tristana.

augments.name: Cavalier Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Cavalier Emblem and a Hecarim.

augments.name: Dawnbringer Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Dawnbringer Emblem and a Gragas.

augments.name: Draconic Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Draconic Emblem and a Zyra.

augments.name: Forgotten Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Forgotten Emblem and a Vayne.

augments.name: Hellion Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Hellion Emblem and a Kennen.

augments.name: Invoker Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Invoker Emblem and a Syndra.

augments.name: Ironclad Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Ironclad Emblem and a Nautilus.

augments.name: Knight Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Knight Emblem and a Thresh.

augments.name: Legionnaire Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Legionnaire Emblem and an Irelia.

augments.name: Mystic Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Mystic Emblem and a Lulu.

augments.name: Nightbringer Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Nightbringer Emblem and a Sejuani.

augments.name: Ranger Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Ranger Emblem and a Varus.

augments.name: Redeemed Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Redeemed Emblem and a Syndra.

augments.name: Renewer Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Renewer Emblem and a Soraka.

augments.name: Revenant Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Revenant Emblem and a Nocturne.

augments.name: Sentinel Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Sentinel Emblem and a Senna.

augments.name: Skirmisher Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Skirmisher Emblem and an Olaf.

augments.name: Spellweaver Crest
augments.desc: Gain a Spellweaver Emblem and a Brand.

augments.name: Abomination Crown
augments.desc: Gain an Abomination Emblem, a Titan's Resolve, and a Brand.

augments.name: Assassin Crown
augments.desc: Gain an Assassin Emblem, a Last Whisper, and a Khazix.

augments.name: Brawler Crown
augments.desc: Gain an Brawler Emblem, a Bramble Vest, and a Sett.

augments.name: Cannoneer Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Cannoneer Emblem, a Guinsoo Rageblade, and a Tristana.

augments.name: Cavalier Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Cavalier Emblem, a Sunfire Cape, and a Hecarim.

augments.name: Dawnbringer Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Dawnbringer Emblem, a Warmog's Armor, and a Gragas.

augments.name: Draconic Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Draconic Emblem, an Archangel Staff, and a Zyra.

augments.name: Forgotten Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Forgotten Emblem, a Guinsoo's Rageblade, and a Vayne.

augments.name: Hellion Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Hellion Emblem, a Morellonomicon, and a Kennen.

augments.name: Invoker Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Invoker Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and a Syndra.

augments.name: Ironclad Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Ironclad Emblem, a Gargoyle Stoneplate, and a Nautilus.

augments.name: Knight Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Knight Emblem, a Gargoyle Stoneplate, and a Thresh.

augments.name: Legionnaire Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Legionnaire Emblem, an Infinity Edge, and an Irelia.

augments.name: Mystic Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Mystic Emblem, an Ionic Spark, and a Lulu.

augments.name: Nightbringer Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Nightbringer Emblem, a Hand of Justice, and a Sejuani.

augments.name: Ranger Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Ranger Emblem, a Deathblade, and a Varus.

augments.name: Redeemed Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Redeemed Emblem, a Hand Of Justice, and a Syndra.

augments.name: Renewer Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Renewer Emblem, a Spear of Shojin, and a Soraka.

augments.name: Revenant Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Revenant Emblem, a Bloodthirster, and a Nocturne.

augments.name: Sentinel Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Sentinel Emblem, a Giant Slayer, and a Senna.

augments.name: Skirmisher Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Skirmisher Emblem, a Bloodthirster, and a Olaf.

augments.name: Spellweaver Crown
augments.desc: Gain a Spellweaver Emblem, a Jeweled Gauntlet, and a Brand.

augments.name: Fiendish Farewell
augments.desc: Whenever a Hellion dies, the portal casts a fireball dealing 66-666 magic damage (based on stage). At 6 Health, heal 6 at the end of combat. Gain a Kennen.

augments.name: The Monstrous Chopper
augments.desc: The Monstrosity equips an axe! Its attacks now cleave in a cone in front of it for 50% of physical damage. Gain a Kalista and a Nunu.

augments.name: Forgotten Arsenal
augments.desc:
For each active tier of the Forgotten trait, gain a different Shadow Support item. Gain a Thresh.

Shadow Support items give powerful bonuses to allies at a cost.

augments.name: The Bloodharbor Zealot
augments.desc: Gain a Pyke. Your strongest Pyke's Ability deals 180% damage, Mana cost is reduced by 60 (down from 120), but no longer Stuns.

augments.name: Morning Dew
augments.desc: Once per combat at 50% Health, Dawnbringers gain 60 Mana over 5 seconds. Gain a Nidalee.

augments.name: Road to Redemption
augments.desc: Redeemed units heal for 500 (split evenly) when a Redeemed ally dies. The first time you heal 12500 this way, gain a Redemption. Gain a Lux.

augments.name: Death Approaches
augments.desc:
Gain a Thresh. Your strongest Thresh's Ability now pulls himself to his target and empowers his next attack to deal 300% Ability Power as bonus magic damage.
Reduces Threshs maximum mana by 60.

augments.name: Nightfall
augments.desc: Nightbringers take 30% max health damage at the start of combat, and gain additional 30% max Health shield and 10% bonus damage when the trait activates. Gain a Yasuo.

augments.name: Night's Wrath
augments.desc: Gain a Sejuani. While Frost Armor is active, your strongest Sejuani's attacks deal an additional 180% of Sejuani's Armor as magic damage.

augments.name: The Sentinels of Light
augments.desc: Whenever the Sentinel shield is passed to a new target, all Sentinel units gain 11% Attack Speed, stacking up to 12 times. Gain an Olaf and a Senna.

augments.name: Egg-o-nomics
augments.desc: Draconic Eggs hatch into additional Gold. Gain a Sett and an Ashe.

augments.name: The Phoenix and the Bear
augments.desc:
Gain a 2 star Udyr. When your strongest Udyr transforms, gain bonus effects:
Reduce Mana cost by 10.
Turtle: Deal Magic Damage in a cone.
Tiger: Stun the enemy.

augments.name: Equestrian Training
augments.desc: Gain a 2-star Kled. Your strongest Kled gains the ability to remount after attacking or getting hit 9 times in dismounted state. Gain 10% Damage Amp.

augments.name: The Bloodharbor Zealot+
augments.desc: Gain a 2-star Pyke. Your strongest Pyke's Ability deals 200% damage, Mana cost is reduced by 60 (down from 120), but no longer Stuns.

augments.name: Death Approaches+
augments.desc: Gain a 2-star Thresh. Your strongest Thresh's Ability now pulls himself to his target and empowers his next attack to deal 300% Ability Power as bonus magic damage.

augments.name: Night's Wrath+
augments.desc: Gain a 2-star Sejuani. While Frost Armor is active, your strongest Sejuani's attacks deal an additional 180% of Sejuani's Armor as magic damage.
